text: Frankenstein is an upcoming American gothic science fiction horror movie. It is expected to be released in November 2025. It was directed by Guillermo del Toro. He also wrote and co-produced the movie with Gary Ungar, Scott Stuber, and J. Miles Dale. The movie is based on the 1818 novel Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus by English author Mary Shelley and is expected to follow most of the novel's story. It follows scientist Victor Frankenstein as he creates a monster from a dead corpse. Principal photography began on February 12, 2024 in Toronto and finished on September 30. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s English-language movies] Category:2020s science fiction horror movies Category:American monster movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies directed by Guillermo del Toro Category:Netflix movies Category:Frankenstein movies Category:Science fiction action movies Category:Upcoming movies
title: Frankenstein (2025 movie)
